title: AI-Generated Images Fuel Surge Of Anti-Muslim Hate In India, Finds Report
description: A new report by the Centre for the Study of Organised Hate (CSOH) has documented how artificial intelligence tools are increasingly being used to create and circulate Islamophobic content in India. The study, which analysed over a thousand AI-generated images, found that these visuals are being used to spread disinformation, reinforce stereotypes, and incite hostility against Muslims.
content:

title: Smartphone-powered AI predicts avocado ripeness
description: Researchers have developed a smartphone-based artificial intelligence system that accurately predicts the ripeness and internal quality of avocados.
content:
Researchers have developed a smartphone-based artificial intelligence system that accurately predicts the ripeness and internal quality of avocados.

title: ready robot dog that fires grenades unveiled

content:

title: Judge fines man $5,000 for improper use of AI in court
description: A Quebec Superior Court judge has ordered a man to pay $5,000 for improperly using artificial intelligence to defend himself in court.
content:
